html: This has kept me optimistic and hopeful throughout my time in Congress. Happy New Year! I hope you and your family and friends enjoyed the holidays, and I wish you all peace and good health in 2019.

html: Since I decided to retire last year, I have received many kind notes. I thank you all for that and for the great privilege of serving you in Congress. Every day in this job, I was reminded that Americans are good people who work hard, care about issues, and deserve to be heard.

html: The next Congress must also be bold and act with courage. It must address climate change, pass legislation to reduce gun violence, and raise the min wage, which is so low it is denying many their chance at the American dream.
